projects.title: ApartFlow
projects.description1: A Residence Management System simplifying residential management tasks like finance, resident management, maintenance scheduling, and reservations. It enhances communication between residents and staff, streamlining operations under the mentorship of Creative Software.
projects.description2: A cross-platform mobile application and a web application built using   React Js, Material-UI, Flutter, Express Js, and MYSQL.

projects.title: Food Delivery Web App
projects.description1: Developed a responsive MERN stack-based food delivery platform with essential features for users and administrators. It includes a dynamic Home page, Cart, Order page, and Sign In/Sign Up popup. The admin panel enables efficient management of orders and menu items, ensuring a seamless user experience and streamlined operations for administrators.
projects.description2: A web application built using MongoDB, Express, React Js, and Node Js.

projects.title: Vita Care Health Monitor
projects.description1: I contributed to a university project developing a smart health device that monitors vital signs like blood pressure, heart rate, body temperature, and SpO2. My role involved sensor integration, system architecture, and designing a real-time interface for displaying health metrics. This project enhanced my IoT skills and fostered innovation in healthcare technology.
projects.description2: Used Arduino, EasyEDA (for PCB design), Blender, React Js and Firebase.
